title: {gofmt,goimports}: consider harmonising import sorting and clustering
body:
See discussion https://groups.google.com/d/topic/golang-nuts/eAtUvHC6moQ/discussion

This issue is filed at the suggestion of @josharian.

goimports has an extended opinion of how import lists should appear that goes beyond the behaviour of gofmt. The result of this is that users of goimports create diff noise in teams where both gofmt and goimports are used by different users.
